item.title: hexdevs podcast
item.description: My wife and I are launching the greatest podcast in the world and a new site called hexdevs! We’ll talk about how to start a business, and how to get better at your craft. We want everyone to be more confident, successful, and smarter, so if you want to become an awesome dev, listen to our podcast and sign up for the mailing list! And stay tuned!
